description:
Reinforcement learning is a sequential decision making framework that
has received a lot of attention given incredible results from DeepMind,
DQN and AlphaGo. More recently DeepMind delivered a more general AI game
player call AlphaZero, which learns by self-play.

During this session we will introduce you the key ideas behind
AlphaZero:

-  Reinforcement Learning and Value function
-  MonteCarlo Tree Search
-  Self-play

We will explore how they contribute to beat greatest Go player of our
time, in Python.

Agenda:

1. Introduction to AI in games
2. What AlphaZero is made of? (Boring theory)
3. How to build your own AlphaZero? (Cool code)

in \_\_on **domenica 22 aprile** at 15:30 `**See
schedule** </p3/schedule/pycon9/>`__
title: (Alpha) Zero to Elo
